```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)

# load data
logs <- data.frame(read.csv("data/logs.csv", header=TRUE))

# transform into player dataset
players <- logs %>%
  group_by(player_id) %>%
  mutate(totalPlaytime = max(event_time_dbl)) %>%
  mutate(gender = max(avatar_gender, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  mutate(race = max(avatar_id, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  mutate(age = max(avatar_age, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  select(player_id, totalPlaytime, gender, race, age) %>%
  distinct()
```

``` {r include=FALSE}
boxplot(
  players$totalPlaytime~players$race
  )
```
